name: @potetotown/vitrio
description: Ultra-minimal reactive UI framework with derive() API

scripts.build:wasm: command -v v >/dev/null 2>&1 && v -b wasm -o dist/vsignal.wasm src/vsignal/signal.v || echo 'V compiler not found, skipping WASM build'
scripts.build: bun run build:wasm && bun build ./src/index.ts ./src/jsx-runtime.ts ./src/jsx-dev-runtime.ts --outdir ./dist --target browser --minify
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run build && bun run build:types
